attributes.action: make cheese free for students who wish to make toasties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All students like toasties, we are aware of this. However, increasing student fees and debt mean they cannot afford the necessary ingreident - cheese. Therefore it should be made free with a valid cheese toastie-making permit. Available from all supermarkets in conjunction with local Universities.
